page.title: 11MY HIGHLAND HOME LIFE
page.content:
"I live at Inveruplan near a river. My house is alone beside trees. I help my father with his job as the Estate Gamekeeper. These are some of the things I do to help him. I weed the garden & open the gates to let the van through. We have 5 dogs, 2 are Collies, & the other 3, fox terriers. They help my Dad to catch foxes. I take in the peats for our fire. You cut peats from peat-banks in the ground. When you cut peats you have to let them dry & then we can take them home. Cutting peats is very hard work. I also help my mother in the house like washing dishes & making my bed. In the winter, deer come down to our house & I help my Dad to feed them"
John MacGonnigal Age 8
